text:
Juji Inc. (https://juji.io) | Front-end Software Engineer | San Jose, CA | Onsite

Juji develops a state of art AI chatbot creation platform. We work with companies such as Google, Robinhood, Barnes and Noble, and universities such as UIUC, Arburn, and Air Force Academy. See https://venturebeat.com/2018/10/18/juji-is-an-empathetic-ai-... for a general description.

We are a Clojure shop. The backend is in Clojure and the frontend is in Clojurescript, with Re-frame and Rum on top of ReactJS. We also leverage python for machine learning and tensorflow for deep learning. Watch https://youtu.be/phA4bMjKvCY for our recent talk in the main Clojure conference.

For details of the position, see https://juji.io/careers#frontend
